Tool

NameUpdate Shapes SRID
ID22
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013

Description

Change the SRID of all geometries in the user-specified column and table.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Options
HostTextPG_HOSTPassword
PortIntegerPG_PORTMinimum: 0 Default: 5432
DatabaseTextPG_NAMEDatabase Name
UserTextPG_USERUser Name
PasswordTextPG_PWDPassword
TablesChoiceTABLESAvailable Choices: [0] Default: 0
EPSG CodeIntegerCRS_EPSGMinimum: -1 Default: -1
